summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Zoho Books integration for Battwheels OS. All backend APIs (17/17 tests) passed. Frontend UI testing verified all Finance and Inventory pages work correctly with imported Zoho Books data.

minor.issue: Console warnings about chart dimensions on dashboard - 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0'

issues: Chart dimension warnings in console - charts may not render properly on initial load

login_flow.details: Admin login (admin@battwheels.in / admin123) works correctly, redirects to dashboard

dashboard.details: Dashboard displays metrics: 1 Vehicle in Workshop, 47 Open Repair Orders, 7.9 Hours Avg Repair Time, 4 Available Technicians

customers_page.details: Shows 51 customers (50 imported from Zoho Books + 1 test customer). Search functionality works correctly.

customer_search.details: Search for 'Bluwheelz' correctly filters to 1 result

invoices_page.details: Analytics cards show: Total Revenue ₹2,299.82, Collected ₹1,237.82, Outstanding ₹1,062, Total Invoices 2

create_invoice_flow.details: Create Invoice dialog opens with customer selection, Services/Parts tabs, GST calculation (18%)

inventory_services.details: Shows 100 services with HSN codes and rates (e.g., T-ROD REPAIR HSN: 998714.0 ₹450 + 18% GST)

inventory_parts.details: Shows 200 parts with HSN codes, stock info, and Low Stock badges

sidebar_navigation.details: All sidebar links work: Failure Intelligence, Dashboard, New Ticket, Vehicles, Services & Parts, Customers, Invoices

gst_calculation.details: Backend correctly calculates 18% GST on invoices. Verified via API test.

critical_code_review_comments: Chart components on dashboard have dimension warnings - may need explicit width/height or container styling
DialogContent missing aria-describedby - accessibility improvement needed

seed_data_verified.customers: 50 from Zoho Books (Bluwheelz Mobility, BARNBOX FOODS, EXPONENT ENERGY, etc.)
seed_data_verified.services: 100 EV repair services (T-ROD REPAIR, CONTROLLER REPAIR, BATTERY REPAIR, etc.)
seed_data_verified.parts: 200 EV parts (HEAD LIGHT ASSEMBLY, BRAKE LEVER, TYRE, etc.)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Zoho Books integration fully tested and working. All Finance module pages (Customers, Invoices) and Inventory (Services & Parts) are functional. GST calculation at 18% is working correctly. The sidebar has 'CATALOG & INVENTORY' section with 'Services & Parts' link. Login page has animated 2W/3W/4W vehicle icons as expected.
